tier2.tier2_description: Activities associated with visiting, accessing, and generally interacting with web pages, including the progression through different stages of a web challenge.
This concerns the identification, examination, and modification of web components, such as HTML elements and forms, as well as the analysis of their frontend behaviors.
Actions revolving around tracking, analyzing, and manipulating user behaviors on the web. This includes the way users fill out forms, take notes, and iterate over repeated actions.

tier2.tier2_category: URL and Browser Analysis and Manipulation
tier2.tier2_description: Activities focusing on examining and altering URLs and browser behaviors, including the analysis of parameters and the use of debugging tools.
Actions related to the examination and modification of HTTP elements and network communications, encompassing headers, requests, responses, and broader network behaviors.
Concerns the analysis and modification of web APIs and endpoints, including interactions with, and manipulations of, these components.
This category involves examining and manipulating web configurations, handling errors, and analyzing feedback mechanisms on web platforms.
A catch-all for various web-related actions and operations that don't neatly fit into the other sub-categories, such as identifying content types or extracting specific data.
Activities focusing on understanding and manipulating authentication mechanisms, as well as the management and analysis of user sessions.
Actions related to the handling, discovery, and management of credentials, tokens, and cookies, including their associated processes and techniques.

tier2.tier2_category: User Management, Access Control, and Permissions
tier2.tier2_description: Pertains to the management of user access, including the processes of registration, control of inappropriate or unauthorized access, and the general maintenance of user permissions.

tier1_category: Data Analysis, Manipulation, and Storage Interactions

tier2.tier2_description: Activities concerned with interpreting and processing data, analyzing systems, and manipulating specific payloads.
Actions related to altering and taking advantage of data, including various forms of injection and user input manipulations.
Pertains to the storage, management, and extraction of data, encompassing both files and structured datasets.
Actions focused on analyzing, managing, and accessing files and directories on a web platform or associated systems.
This sub-category revolves around database analysis, exploitation techniques, and manipulations, such as SQL injections.
Deals with specialized data and file processing tasks, including the analysis and manipulation of media files and PDFs.
Activities concerning the logging and tracking of data and user actions on web platforms and systems.
A catch-all for various data-related actions and processes that don't neatly fit into the other sub-categories, such as data exfiltration.
Pertains to the deep-dive inspection and understanding of codebases, scripts, and the technology stacks behind them, including reverse engineering efforts.
Actions surrounding the examination and testing of web applications, including their server environments and directory structures.
Addresses the structural analysis of web content, including the examination of URLs, strings, and characters found on web platforms.
Focuses on identifying, understanding, and validating patterns and structures present in code and other digital content.
Broadly covers actions related to understanding documentation, concepts, and recognizing functionalities within applications and scripts.
Activities centered around the discovery and understanding of system vulnerabilities.
Addresses the understanding, modification, and handling of web requests and their associated interactions.
Revolves around designing, refining, and executing specific payloads against systems or applications.
Encompasses the process of creating, testing, and utilizing exploits, including leveraging various tools.
Actions and techniques related to executing targeted attacks, such as injection attacks or bypassing restrictions.
Techniques associated with altering data or system configurations to gain unauthorized access or privileges.
Techniques targeting vulnerabilities related to XML processing and file inclusion mechanisms.
Encompasses supplementary exploitation actions and activities, including post-exploitation investigations.
Activities related to understanding the setup, configuration, vulnerabilities, and interactions of servers.
Deep-dive analysis of source codes, server configurations, headers, and advanced techniques such as reverse engineering.
Pertains to the understanding and management of network components, including traffic and protocol analysis.
Activities related to the analysis, handling, and understanding of network requests, responses, and associated payloads.
Actions centered around manipulating, transferring, and exploiting data within systems and networks.
Focuses on examining and understanding IP addresses, domain name systems, and their associated resolutions and queries.
Revolves around executing and exploiting system commands to gain unauthorized access or privileges.
In-depth analysis of HTTP-specific components, such as commands and parameters.
A catch-all for other analysis actions related to systems that don't neatly fit into the aforementioned sub-categories.
Activities associated with web development, testing, and understanding how different web components function and interact.
Actions that ensure the accuracy and legitimacy of data, flags, and other actions on a web platform.
Revolves around tracking and understanding system processes, responses, and other observable metrics.
Techniques and actions taken to identify, understand, and resolve errors and issues within applications and systems.
Focuses on understanding, observing, and analyzing various inputs, outputs, and navigational behaviors on web platforms.
Activities related to gathering hints, understanding guidelines, and testing various payloads.
Revolves around leveraging browser tools and analyzing various network configurations and behaviors.
Actions and techniques related to preventing certain behaviors and understanding character-based inputs and outputs.
Encompasses the study, analysis, and application of cryptography, including hashing and handling of JWTs.
Focuses on actions related to encoding data into formats like Base64, compressing data, serialization, and IP address conversion.
Techniques and methodologies dedicated to understanding and resolving CAPTCHAs.
Methods and strategies used to observe and analyze data patterns and behaviors without direct interaction.
Actions related to using and configuring different tools, including third-party software.
Engages with system-level actions, server setups, managing network interactions, and understanding system permissions.
Techniques centered on creating, running, and automating scripts, as well as modifying existing scripts for unique tasks.
Actions related to managing files and directories, and the execution of commands interacting with these entities.
Techniques to manipulate data or input in desired ways, craft payloads, and observe and adjust tokens.
Engages in interactions with websites, networks, and services, focusing on requests, responses, and various APIs.
Pertains to the handling of command-line interactions, system configurations, and automated processes.
Focuses on actions and challenges specific to interactions with scripting languages, particularly PHP and Python.
Activities centered around identifying, analyzing, and exploiting vulnerabilities, as well as gaining knowledge about them.
Techniques associated with understanding problems, enumerating targets, gathering information, and gaining insights into systems and services.
Encompasses the analysis of web sites/applications, discovery of network components, understanding security postures, and exploring files and directories for vulnerabilities.
Involves activities aimed at understanding and categorizing challenges, and gleaning insights from web applications.
Pertains to formulating and executing strategies, understanding game mechanics, and reviewing challenge documentation.
Techniques related to reviewing documentation, examining codes, and retrieving pertinent information.
Encompasses actions related to deploying and testing different techniques, iterating over methods, and applying time-based strategies.
Activities related to recording observations, conducting research, and analyzing findings.
Methods for managing, reviewing, and gaining insights from version control systems and repositories.
An umbrella for diverse techniques, strategies, and actions not strictly categorized elsewhere.
